body: This simple bronze headband is decorated with an intricate pattern of fine green etchings. The headband grants the wearer an enhancement bonus to Wisdom of +2, +4, or +6. Treat this as a temporary ability bonus for the first 24 hours the headband is worn.
name: Headband of inspired wisdom
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Headbands/Headband Slot Wondrous Items/Headband of inspired wisdom
